sentences.sContent: After much persuasion he agreed to withdraw his resignation.
sentences.sCn: 几经劝说，他同意收回辞呈。

sentences.sContent: Many depressed people just withdraw into themselves.
sentences.sCn: 许多患抑郁症的人就是把自己封闭起来。

words.tran: 偏僻的；沉默寡言的；孤独的
可抽出的；可更换的；可拆卸的；能够提取的
撤退，收回；提款；取消；退股
回收者；回收器；弃权者（withdraw的名词形式）

remMethod.val: with(向后) ＋ draw(拉) → 向后拉扯 → 撤退； 收回

trans.tranCn: 收回，撤回；变得沉默寡言，冷漠，冷淡
trans.tranOther: if you withdraw a threat, offer, request etc, you say that you no longer will do what you said
